text: The 1928–29 Campionat de Catalunya season was the 30th since its establishment and was played between 30 September and 2 December 1928. ==Overview before the season== Six teams joined the Division One league, including three that would play the 1929 La Liga: *Barcelona *Espanyol *Europa ==Division One== ===League table=== ===Results=== ===Top goalscorers=== {| class="wikitable sortable" class="wikitable" |- style="background:#ccc; text-align:center;" !Goalscorers !Goals !Team |- | Manuel Cros | style="text-align:center;" | 12 |Europa |- | Domingo Broto | style="text-align:center;" | 9 |Espanyol |- | Francisco Tena | style="text-align:center;" | 8 |Espanyol |- | Ángel Arocha | style="text- align:center;" | 6 |Barcelona |- | Juan Miró | style="text-align:center;" | 6 |Sants |- |} ==Play-off league== ==Division Two== ===Group A=== ===Group B=== ===Group C=== ===Repechage=== ===Relegation playoff=== Category:Copa Catalunya seasons Category:1928–29 in Spanish football
title: 1928–29 Campionat de Catalunya
